title: Autogame Deluxe
notes: Steam shows Positive (94% of 19). SteamDB shows 85.19% positive (19 reviews); small sample. Steam store lists Shared/Split Screen PvP and 19 reviews; supports keyboard/gamepad.
raw_comment: One button party game. Drive a car and try not to crash into other cars. When you press your button the car turns 90 degrees and accelerates. 1-10 local players. Shared screen.
